main event: An unidentified flying object was observed flying parallel to an aircraft from Denver, Colorado to Hanksville, Utah on September 3, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as being sea-green in color and giving off red, green, and white lights.
The object's speed was estimated to be around 600 mph.
The object was observed to be very close and its metallic appearance was clearly visible.
Pilots from multiple flights, including TWA and American Airlines, reported seeing the same object over Utah.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were recorded, including cloud cover, wind, and thunderstorms in the area.
sighted object: a shiny, metallic object with colored lights
